member.name: M:Gateway.API.Controllers.Auth.TokenController.GenerateToken(System.Object)
member.summary: Generates JWT token based on the given username and password.
member.returns: JWT token response model if the authentication is successful, otherwise returns Bad Request.

member.param: Model containing the token to be introspected.
member.returns: SystemUserResponseModel if the token is valid, otherwise returns Bad Request.

member.name: T:Gateway.API.Helpers.HttpServiceProxy
member.summary: Implementation of the IComplaintRepository interface for managing Complaint entities in the database.

member.name: M:Gateway.API.Helpers.HttpServiceProxy.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The used to make HTTP requests to the downstream service.
The URL of the downstream service to proxy requests to.

member.name: T:Gateway.API.Helpers.IHttpServiceProxy
member.summary: A interface for proxy service that handles communication between an API and an external HTTP service.

member.name: M:Gateway.API.Helpers.IHttpServiceProxy.Get(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sends a GET request to the specified endpoint of the external service.
member.param: The endpoint of the external service to send the request to. If empty, the base URL of the external service is used.
The accept header to include in the request. If not provided, the response will be formatted as JSON.
member.returns: An representing the response from the external service.

member.name: M:Gateway.API.Helpers.IHttpServiceProxy.GetById(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sends a GET request to the specified endpoint of the external service with a unique identifier.
member.param: The endpoint of the external service to send the request to, including the identifier.
The accept header to include in the request. If not provided, the response will be formatted as JSON.
member.returns: An representing the response from the external service.

member.name: M:Gateway.API.Helpers.IHttpServiceProxy.Post(System.Object,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sends a POST request to the specified endpoint of the external service with the specified request body.
member.param: The request body to send in the request.
The endpoint of the external service to send the request to. If empty, the base URL of the external service is used.
The accept header to include in the request. If not provided, the response will be formatted as JSON.
member.returns: An representing the response from the external service.

member.name: M:Gateway.API.Helpers.IHttpServiceProxy.Patch(System.String,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Sends a PATCH request to the specified endpoint of the external service with the specified request body.
member.param: The endpoint of the external service to send the request to. If empty, the base URL of the external service is used.
The request body to send in the request.
The accept header to include in the request. If not provided, the response will be formatted as JSON.
member.returns: An representing the response from the external service.

member.name: M:Gateway.API.Helpers.IHttpServiceProxy.Put(System.String,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Sends a PUT request to the specified endpoint of the external service.
member.param: The endpoint of the external service to send the request to, including the identifier.
The request body to send in the request.
The accept header to include in the request. If not provided, the response will be formatted as JSON.
member.returns: An representing the response from the external service.

member.name: M:Gateway.API.Helpers.IHttpServiceProxy.Delete(System.String,System.String)
